author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Announcement Trailer for BlazBlue Entropy Effect X, a roguelike action game based on the hit BlazBlue franchise developed by 91Act in collaboration with Arc System Works. 

Players will fight through an original story with beloved characters from the game, fast-paced and precise combat, and vibrant 2D visuals. BlazBlue Entropy Effect X is launching on February 12, 2026, for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch.

#IGN #Blazblue #Roguelike
title: BlazBlue Entropy Effect X - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the next installment in the renowned RPG Series with Octopath Traveler 0, developed by Square Enix. Get a taste of the game's high-stakes, wide cast of characters, and HD-2D graphics of Octopath Traveler launching on December 4 for PlayStation 4 (PS4) and PlayStation 5 (PS5), with a demo available now.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5
title: Octopath Traveler 0 - Official Story Trailer | State of Play 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the announcement trailer for Tokyo Xtreme Racer, the exciting arcade racer from Genki that’s coming to PlayStation for the first time in 20 years. Tokyo Xtreme Racer is a racing game set in a blocked-off future Tokyo, where players aim to be the fastest by driving their best cars on the highways that weave through the city. Tokyo Xtreme Racer is coming to PlayStation 5 on February 26, 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5
title: Tokyo Xtreme Racer - PlayStation 5 Announcement Trailer | State of Play 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out this announcement trailer for inKONBINI: One Store, the cozy new game in which you run your own convenience store in a quiet town. Stock the shelves, chat with customers, and collect capsule toys. inKONBINI will be released for PlayStation 5 in April 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5
title: inKONBINI: One Store - Official Announcement Trailer | State of Play 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the BrokenLore: ASCEND announcement trailer for the upcoming first-person psychological horror game about obsession, fame, and fear. Join Ren and Yui, two renowned rooftop climbers, as they attempt a forbidden nighttime ascent of Japan’s tallest building, the mysterious Elysium Tower.

What begins as the ultimate stunt for their channel, SKYLIMIT, soon spirals into a nightmare. A supernatural entity, the Rokurokubi, emerges to haunt them, a twisted reflection of their deepest terror: becoming forgotten and irrelevant.

The higher they climb, the more reality unravels. For Ren and Yui, stopping means losing everything, but reaching the top might cost them their sanity or their lives.

BrokenLore: ASCEND will be available on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5
title: BrokenLore: ASCEND - Official Announcement Trailer | State of Play

author: IGN
description:
BrokenLore: UNFOLLOW gets a new trailer and a release date announcement. Watch the latest BrokenLore: UNFOLLOW trailer for this upcoming psychological horror game, which is the third chapter in the BrokenLore horror series. BrokenLore: UNFOLLOW explores the psychological effects of social media on mental health, continuing the series’ blend of symbolic horror and human drama. 

BrokenLore: UNFOLLOW will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and Steam on January 16, 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5
title: BrokenLore: UNFOLLOW - Official Release Date Trailer | State of Play

author: IGN
description:
Always be ready to play on a 27"" Gaming Monitor with DualSense® Charging Hook from PlayStation®.
 
The 27"" Gaming Monitor with DualSense® Charging Hook features a QHD screen with HDR visuals*, up to 240 Hz refresh rate* with VRR support* for smooth gameplay, and a convenient DualSense® wireless controller charging hook to keep you ready for action anytime. Bring the PlayStation® experience to your desktop to ensure your gaming space is always ready to play.
  
Features available with compatible devices and supported games, sold separately. Supports a refresh rate of up to 120 Hz when connected to a PlayStation®5 console. Design and specifications are subject to change without notice.
title: PlayStation Gaming Monitor with DualSense Charging Hook - Official Teaser Trailer | State of Play

author: IGN
description:
Pigeon Simulator is out now on Xbox Series X|S and available with Game Pass. Check out the Pigeon Simulator launch trailer for this SCP-inspired co-op adventure game. 

The pigeons have come home to roost… but something’s not right in New Squawk City. Anomalies are spreading, and it’s up to the elite Paranormal Examination & Kontainment (P.E.K.) Unit to clean up the mess. Team up with up to 3 other pigeon agents in this SCP-inspired co-op adventure to locate, identify and extract the dangerous anomalies that have begun to terrorize the city.
title: Pigeon Simulator - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Full Teaser Trailer for Toy Story 5, the fifth installment in the classic animated film series distributed by Walt Disney. Embark on another animated adventure with Buzz, Woody, Jessie, and more alongside newcomers with Lilypad in Toy Story 5, in theaters on June 19, 2026.

In the teaser, fans are introduced to the new character Lilypad, a high-tech frog-shaped smart tablet voiced by Greta Lee that makes Buzz, Woody, Jessie, and the rest of the gang’s jobs exponentially harder when they have to go head-to-head with the all-new threat to playtime.

Tom Hanks returns as the ever loyal cowboy Woody, Tim Allen reports for duty as Buzz Lightyear, and Joan Cusack saddles up again as the rootin’ tootin’ cowgirl Jessie. It was recently announced that Conan O’Brien will also be a part of the voice cast as the toilet training tech toy, Smarty Pants.

“Toy Story 5” is directed by Academy Award® winner Andrew Stanton, co-directed by Kenna Harris, and produced by Lindsey Collins. Th
title: Toy Story 5 - Official Full Teaser Trailer (2026) Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Greta Lee

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Controls Overview Trailer for Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game (working title), an upcoming 2D anime action fighting game based on the hit Avatar: The Last Airbender and The Legend of Korra series, developed by Gameplay Group International in collaboration with Paramount. Players can get the rundown on the game's core controls with a Light Attack, Medium Attack, Heavy Attack, and the unique Flow button that allows for character-specific movement options for evading attacks, counterattacks, and more. Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game is launching in Summer 2026 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam), with a closed alpha running from December 5 through December 7.

Wishlist the game here on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2424420/Avatar_Legends_The_Fighting_Game/

For more updates, follow the official channels below:

https://x.com/avatar_fighters 
https://www.instagram.com/avatar_fighters/ 
https://

Get a look at Gambit's move set, abilities, and Ultimate with the latest Character Trailer for Season 5 of Marvel Rivals, launching on November 14 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#MarvelRivals #Gambit #Gaming

author: IGN
description:
Edgar Wright and Glen Powell have teamed up to remake a classic Arnold Schwarzenegger 80s action flick with The Running Man. But it was also a Stephen King sci fi novel before anything else. The story of Ben Richards in a near future dystopia filled with health care crises, extreme wealth inequality and deadly reality competition shows is a perfect pairing for Edgar Wright, but can the latest iteration of The Running Man pull from both the book and the movie to survive out in the world?

#IGN #Movies
title: The Running Man Review

author: IGN
description:
Enshrouded is back with a new, huge, moist update, Wake of the Water! And if you haven’t heard of or played Enshrouded yet, it’s a survival game with a unique spin—full of deep RPG systems, epic battles, a world of intrigue, and of course, crafting. So, whether you’re just a chill guy looking to settle down and enjoy life on the farm, or if you want to become a legendary warrior who parries everything in their path, here’s 10 things you need to know about Enshrouded and its new update, Wake of Water!

https://connect.enshrouded.com/IGN_Video

Presented by Keen Games Studio

author: IGN
description:
Darkness has fallen over Sedletz Monastery. Check out the latest Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 trailer for the Mysteria Ecclesiae DLC, which is the final story expansion for the action RPG. Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2's Mysteria Ecclesiae DLC features new quests, new characters, multiple endings, and new equipment, including an outfit, weapon, potions, and books.

In Mysteria Ecclesiae or “Mysteries of the Church,” Henry investigates a deadly affliction spreading within the Sedletz monastery, but the truth soon proves far darker. The church crypts have been disturbed; Teutonic guards patrol the halls, and intrigue seeps through every corner. To uncover the mystery, Henry must rely on his cunning, alchemical skills, and a fair bit of stealth. 

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - Mysteria Ecclesiae is available now on PC, Xbox Series X|S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5), and as part of the Expansion Pass.

#IGN #KingdomComeDeliverance2 #MedievalRPG
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - Official Mysteria Ecclesiae DLC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Love is a Battlefield' Season 5 Trailer for Marvel Rivals, the hit team-based hero shooter developed by NetEase Games. 

Players can join the wedding of a lifetime with Gambit and Rogue entering the battle with Season 5. Both Rogue and Gambit join the roster in Season 5 for Marvel Rivals, kicking off on November 14 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #MarvelRivals #XMen
title: Marvel Rivals - Official 'Love is a Battlefield' Season 5 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Running Man from Edgar Wright isn't just a remake of an Arnold Schwarzenegger classic, it's also a second adaptation of a Stephen King novel. Writing under the psuedonym Richard Bachman in the early 80s, the king of horror churned out a terrifyingly prescient bit of science fiction about an authoritarian regime keeping the masses entertained with a gladiatorial game show called The Running Man. While Glen Powell and Edgar Wright run right along side the book, Arnold's campy 1987 version was wildly different. So get your one-liners ready, because it's time to ask What's the Difference?

#IGN #Movies
title: The Running Man | Book vs. Movie

author: IGN
description:
When their beloved dog Merv loses his spark after their split, Anna (Zooey Deschanel) and Russ (Charlie Cox) are forced into the world’s most awkward co-parenting arrangement. Hoping to shake Merv out of his funk, Russ takes him to Florida for a much-needed getaway—only for Anna to show up unexpectedly. As Merv slowly gets his groove back, turns out fixing their dog’s broken heart may lead to a few sparks of their own.

#IGN
title: Merv - Official Trailer (2025) Charlie Cox, Zooey Deschanel

author: IGN
description:
Battlefield REDSEC reviewed by Charlie Wacholz on PC, also available on Xbox and PlayStation.

After catching a few wins across all three of its main queues, Battlefield REDSEC’s slow-rolling storm just hasn’t done much to keep me wanting more aside from introducing a few interesting missions here and there. It’s enjoyable, sure, but its adaptation doesn’t mesh well with the pace and epic scale that makes Battlefield 6’s regular multiplayer so much fun. But where REDSEC’s battle royale only dilutes that formula, the Gauntlet mode that lives alongside it instead boils down and concentrates the best stuff from both Battlefield and battle royales at large into one of the coolest game modes I’ve seen from a military shooter in a long time. I hope EA and DICE plan on fleshing it out as part of their Battlefield 6 roadmap, because while I may not be interested in playing more of the battle royale mode, I am certainly interested in more Gauntlet.
title: Battlefield REDSEC Review
